register_username_tip: Choose a nice looking username that will be shown to other players
register_password_tip: Choose a long password with different characters
login_2FA_subtitle: Checkout your email, We've sent you a code!
settings_tab_color_text: This will be shown to other players ingame and in your profile
settings_tab_lang_text: Note: The page may not be translated at 100%
settings_more_2FA: Add more security to your account activating 2FA
settings_sure_2FA: Are you sure you want to activate the 2FA?
settings_enter_2FA: An email has been sent to your personal account with a code, check it!
settings_sure2_2FA: Are you sure you want to deactivate the 2FA?
searchbar_who: Who do you want to chat with?
error_not_allowed: You are not allowed to see this page. Are you logged in?
error_not_found_text: The page you are trying to access has been moved or does not exist.
error_unauthorized_text: You are not allowed to see this page. Are you logged in?
match_gen_max_time: Max time for each round seconds
match_gen_best_of_error: There can't be less rounds than the ones needed to win
tournament_gen: This is where you set tournament settings
home_message: to take this messages away set debug in home.component to false
register_choose_email: Choose an email account as personal identification
register_username_inuse: This username is already in use, choose another.
register_email_notvalid: This email is not valid. Check that you have written it correctly.
register_username_notvalid: This username is not valid. Check that it's length is between 6 and 20 characters.
register_make_sure: Make sure the password has more than 6 characters.
register_unexpected: An unexpected error has occurred! Try again.
settings_privacy_delete2: Your stadistics and data will be deleted from SpacePong.
settings_privacy_noback: Once you press the button, there will be no turning back.
settings_privacy_leave: You're leaving the platform but you want your statistics to stay here?
settings_privacy_phrase1: , SpacePong will anonimizr all related data with you
settings_privacy_phrase3: In that momemt, the account will be
settings_privacy_phrase6: you'll not be able to log in again
settings_public_choose: Choose a unique username to identify yourself
settings_public_other: This username is already in use! Choose anotherone.
settings_public_archive_notpermited: This type of file is not permited. Try with another one.
settings_update_email: Update the email associated with your account
settings_update_email_inuse: This email is already in use!
settings_update_password: Change the password you use to log in
settings_update_password_new_nomatch: The new password does not match!
settings_update_password_new_empty: The new password cannot be empty!
settings_update_password_same: The new password cannot be the same as the current one!
verify_verification_error: Verification error, something has gone wrong, try using the URL that has been sent to your email without modifications
postregister_title: Please check your email account to verify your account
postregister_subtitle: Once you verify your email you'll be able to log in!
user_profile_timeout: If it is taking too long, please check that you are logged in
